name: Mauled
description:
I developed this game single-handedly and I'm passionate about delivering a fun experience. While I may be a one-man team, I'm committed to improving and updating the game based on your feedback. For direct suggestions, join our Discord channel.

Support My Work:

If you enjoy the game and want to support its ongoing development, consider leaving a positive review. Your feedback will help in the creation of new assets, plugins, and technologies to improve the game.

Join the Community:

  • Discord: https://discord.gg/umYn6J56bz
  • Youtube: https://www.youtube.com/@elementsgames

Download Mauled now and dive into the action!
